short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switches between Perplexity and Google search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Very simple toggle between Perplexity and Google Search. To search perplexity, add -p before your query in the search bar, or -pr to search with perplexity pro. Start your query with -c to search with ChatGPT. Default remains Google.
